summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4861 for the improvement of East 70th Street from 16th Avenue Northeast to 20th Avenue Northeast, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55880, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
